TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWsdlExportExtension

summary.span: 定义可导出自定义元数据的终结点或协定行为。

span.span: Defines endpoint or contract behaviors that can export custom metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要修改和扩展 对象导出的 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL)，请在终结点、协定或操作行为（一个实现 、 或 的对象）上实现 接口，并将该行为添加到 、 或 属性。To modify and extend the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) exported by objects, implement the interface on an endpoint, contract, or operation behavior (an object that implements either , , or ) and add the behavior to the , , or property. 此外，还可以在 上实现 。In addition, you can also implement on a . > [!NOTE] > 如果 实现是作为 实现的，则从不会调用这些实现。 implementations are never invoked if they are implemented as an . 即使 将自定义绑定策略断言导出到 WSDL 内的相应元素，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 也不会导出自定义策略断言。 does not export custom policy assertions even though [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] exports custom binding policy assertions to the appropriate element inside WSDL. 如果要导出自定义策略断言，请实现 接口。If you want to export custom policy assertions, implement the interface. 元数据发布过程首先调用 ，后者继而为每个终结点调用 。The metadata publication process begins by calling which in turn calls for each endpoint. 导出终结点时将首先导出其协定。在导出协定时， 将在协定的所有 实现以及该协定的操作行为上调用 方法。The endpoint is exported by first exporting its contract.When exporting a contract the calls the method on all implementations on the contract, and operation behaviors for that contract. 在元数据中不会导出使用通配符操作的操作，因此将不会导出这些操作的操作行为上的 实现。Operations that use wildcard actions are not exported in metadata, so implementations on operation behaviors for these operations are not exported. 导出协定后，将导出端口和绑定，并附加导出的策略表达式。After exporting the contract, the port and binding are exported and exported policy expressions are attached. 和 方法都提供了对 的访问，因此 实现可通过 属性报告可恢复的错误和警告。Both the and the methods provide access to the so that implementations can report recoverable errors and warnings through the property. 通过传入这两个方法的上下文对象，可以方便地从导出的 WSDL 元素映射到 和 对象的属性。The context objects passed into both methods provide convenient mappings from exported WSDL elements to properties of and objects. 如果 实现在导出时引发异常，生成的元数据将处于不一致状态，并且应丢弃 对象。If an implementation throws an exception on export, the generated metadata is in an inconsistent state and the object should be discarded. > [!NOTE] > 内置序列化程序填充服务说明之后，必须运行自定义导出扩展。Custom export extension must run after the built-in serializer populates the service description. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 ，它将自定义文档属性以 WSDL 批注的形式添加到 WSDL 文件中。The following code example shows an that adds custom documentation attributes to the WSDL file as WSDL annotations. [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationattribute.cs#6)] [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationattribute.cs#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ExportContract(class System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter exporter, class System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext context) cil managed
Public Sub ExportContract (exporter As WsdlExporter, context As WsdlContractConversionContext)

span.span: The that exports the contract information.

param.name: context
param.span: 提供从导出的 WSDL 元素到协定说明的映射。

span.span: Provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the contract description.

summary.span: 为协定将自定义 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 元素写入到生成的 WSDL 中。

span.span: Writes custom Web Services Description Language (WSDL) elements into the generated WSDL for a contract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元数据导出系统导出协定时调用 方法。The method is called when the metadata export system is exporting the contract. 只有实现 的协定和操作行为才能获得 调用。Only contract and operation behaviors implementing get the call. 实现 的所有行为都可获得 调用。All behaviors implementing get the call. 使用 `context` 参数来修改要导出的 WSDL。Use the `context` parameter to modify the WSDL to be exported. 有关示例，请参见“示例”一节。For an example, see the Example section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 ，它将自定义文档属性以 WSDL 批注的形式添加到 WSDL 文件中。The following code example shows an that adds custom documentation attributes to the WSDL file as WSDL annotations. [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationattribute.cs#6)] [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationattribute.cs#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ExportEndpoint(class System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter exporter, class System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext context) cil managed
Public Sub ExportEndpoint (exporter As WsdlExporter, context As WsdlEndpointConversionContext)

span.span: The that exports the endpoint information.

param.name: context
param.span: 提供从导出的 WSDL 元素到终结点说明的映射。

span.span: Provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the endpoint description.

summary.span: 为终结点将自定义 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 元素写入到生成的 WSDL 中。

span.span: Writes custom Web Services Description Language (WSDL) elements into the generated WSDL for an endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 方法，以便修改为终结点导出的 WSDL。Implement the method to modify the WSDL exported for an endpoint. 将在 已导出协定后调用此方法。This method is called after the contract has been exported by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 ，它将自定义文档属性以 WSDL 批注的形式添加到 WSDL 文件中。The following code example shows an that adds custom documentation attributes to the WSDL file as WSDL annotations. [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationattribute.cs#6)] [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationattribute.cs#7)]
